alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 18 at 2:35PM EDT until April 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of up to one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Garrett County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 8 PM EDT this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 2 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult to nearly impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
